ComicInfo.Title: Table Games; Twenty-Fourth Floor; Dreams & Disguises
ComicInfo.Summary:
Two women play pool to settle a bet. The wager: sex, of course! Also: a woman relates her twisted erotic dreams, and what could be riskier than sex in a moving elevator?
